context:properties.context:name: PubMan Test Collection
context:properties.context:description: This is the sample collection description of the PubMan Test collection. Any content can be stored in this collection, which is of relevance for the users of the system. You can submit relevant bibliographic information for your publication (metadata) and all relevant files. The MPS is the responsible affiliation for this collection. Please contact u.tschida@zim.mpg.de for any questions.
